name: Dice Cop
description:
Dice Cop

Did a Game Jam this week with the theme, "Roll of the Dice." Threw this together in around 12 hours. You play as Dice Cop, a cop determined to guess the right three digit number to put Dice Capone away for good

.:How to Win:

The digits of three positions must add up to the clue (hint: check your notepad with ). You have six guesses. I missed the cut off by a few hours, but it's my first game jam. :-)

.:Losing:

Eh... you'll just run out of guesses and then refresh browser. 

:Instructions:

Use the lie detector which shows if the number in a given position is higher (red +) or lower (red -) than the real number. If the number is green, then he's telling the truth. To accuse Dice Capone of lying about a number in a certain position press 1 - 3. Watch out, he might not change his story, and then you just lost a guess.To guess the right number bring up your notepad by pressing . You navigate through each field by pressing A-C, and then enter a number 1-6.Finally to accuse Dice Capone based on your notes press .

:Bugs:

Not responsive or mobile friendly. Bug literarily everywhere, the goal is to build as fast as possible, not follow the QMS process. :-DD
